  def initialize *a, &b
    @version = nil
    @leftovers = []
    @specs = {}
    @long = {}
    @short = {}
    @order = []
    @constraints = []
    @stop_words = []
    @stop_on_unknown = false

    #instance_eval(&b) if b # can't take arguments
    cloaker(&b).bind(self).call(*a) if b
  end
